## [A - Frog 1](https://atcoder.jp/contests/dp/tasks/dp_a)

Definimos:<br><br>
$dp[i]$ el costo mínimo de ir desde la piedra $i$ hasta la piedra $N$

<!-- begin code -->
<div class="collapsed code-title" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#codeExample1" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseTwo">
<!-- title -->
<i class="fas fa-caret-right"></i> <p class="title">Código (por Alex)</p>

<div id="codeExample1" class="collapse">

```c++
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int INF = 1e9+5;

int main() {
	int n;
	cin >> n;
	vector<int> h(n+1);
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
		cin >> h[i];
	}
	
	vector<int> dp(n+1, INF);
	dp[n] = 0;
	for (int i = n; i >0; i--) {
		for (int j : {i-1, i-2}) {
			if (j >0) {
				dp[j] = min(dp[j], dp[i] + abs(h[i] - h[j]));
				//cout<<j<<" "<<dp[j]<<" "<<dp[i]<<" "<<h[i]<<" "<<h[j]<<"\n";
			}
		}
	}
	cout << dp[1] << "\n";
}
```
